itemInfo.itemDesc:
A product made by Shaking Potato Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Potato Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made of Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Grinding Potatoes.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\nâ€» Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.
